# Labs and Challenges : 

 - Find code for an example of a hierarchical generative model in
 the book: [Modern Statistics for Modern Biology](https://www.huber.embl.de/msmb/)

 - Install the package `generative` from the github repository 
 `spholme`/generative` using the package `devtools` with
 
 ```
 devtools::install_github("spholmes/generative")
 ```
 
 - Try out examples from the repository of the paper at: [https://go.wisc.edu/833zs8](https://go.wisc.edu/833zs8) 
 
 - Code: [https://go.wisc.edu/7222i9](https://go.wisc.edu/7222i9)
